name: Alien Tank Armor
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Inactive Alien Tank Armor" "268507" #L "Alien Activation Crystal" "268478" #L "Alien Armor Materials" "268508" x2 or x3 #L "Inactive Alien Material Conversion Kit" "268510" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Alien Activation Crystal + Inactive Alien Material Conversion kit = #L "Alien Material Conversion Kit" "268509" Skills: | 450ME | Alien Material Conversion Kit + Alien Armor Materials = #L "Processed Alien Armor Materials" "268511" Skills: | 450ME | ------------------------------ Alien Activation Crystal + Inactive Alien Tank Armor = #L "Alien Tank Armor" "268503" Skills: | 450ME | ------------------------------ Warning! -- The next step makes this item NODROP and UNIQUE! Warning! -- Nanomages DO NOT do the next 2 steps!! ------------------------------ Processed Alien Armor Materials + Alien Tank Armor = #L "Improved Alien Tank Armor" "268504" Skills: | 450ME | ------------------------------ Processed Alien Armor Materials + Improved Alien Tank Armor = #L "Perfected Alien Tank Armor" "268505" Skills: | 450ME | ------------------------------ Warning! -- The next 2 steps are for NANOMAGES ONLY!! ------------------------------ Alien Material Conversion Kit + Processed Alien Armor Materials = #L "Specialised Alien Armor Materials" "268512" Skills: | 450ME | ------------------------------ Specialised Alien Armor Materials + Alien Tank Armor = #L "Nanomage Enhanced Alien Tank Armor" "268506" Skills: | 450ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Just be extra careful you perform the right steps for your breed. Nanomages have different steps to take than other breeds.
